name: Soarin' Squirrel
description:
A simple Flappy Bird style game about a flying squirrel that collects acorns.

Instructions:

- Click / tap / Space Bar to flap

- Pass through trees for 1 point

- Collect acorns for 2 points!

- Don't hit the trees!

Soarin' Squirrel was made in ~3 hours for Trijam #83 - the 3 hour game jam. I used Construct 3 to make the game, and Photoshop to make all the art. The music was made by myself for a previous project. The sound effects are from various royalty-free sources.
